title: Automated Identification of Stroke Thrombolysis Contraindications from Synthetic Clinical Notes–a Proof-of-Concept Study
details: BY Chen, F Antaki, M Gonzalez, K Uchino, S Albahra… - Cerebrovascular Diseases …, 2025
abstract: Background: Timely thrombolytic therapy improves outcomes in acute ischemic stroke. Manual chart review to screen for thrombolysis contraindications may be time- consuming and prone to errors. We developed and tested a large language model …
